resources.string: "This lets Heads Up know when you're outdoors. On the next two screens, select "While using the app > Allow all the time.

{DEVICE_TYPE,select, DEVICE_PHONE{Use Bedtime mode to silence your phone and keep the screen dark at bedtime}DEVICE_TABLET{Use Bedtime mode to silence your tablet and keep the screen dark at bedtime}other{Use Bedtime mode to silence your device and keep the screen dark at bedtime}}
